ru.perm.kefir.bbcode
Class Scope

java.lang.Object
  ru.perm.kefir.bbcode.Scope

public class Scope
extends java.lang.Object

bb-code scope. Required for tables, for example. Scope contains code set for parsing text.

Author:
Vitaliy Samolovskih aka Kefir

Field Detail

ROOT

public static final java.lang.String ROOT
Default name for root scope. If ROOT scope not defined in configuration then all codes add to defqult ROOT scope.

See Also:

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Get scope name

Returns:
scope name

setParent

public void setParent(Scope parent)
Set parent scope

Parameters:
parent - parent scope. All parent scope code added to scope codes.

setScopeCodes

Add codes to scope

Parameters:

getCodes

public java.util.List<AbstractCode> getCodes()
Return all scope codes include parent codes.

Returns:
list of codes in priority order.

isIgnoreText

public boolean isIgnoreText()
By default it is false.

Returns:
true if not parsiable text mustn't append to result. false if not parsiable text append to result as is.

setIgnoreText

public void setIgnoreText(boolean ignoreText)
Set flag marked that not parsiable text mustn't append to result. By default it is false.

Parameters:
ignoreText - flag value

isInitialized

public boolean isInitialized()
Returns:
true if scope was initialised, false otherwise
